subject: RE: [junit] org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener
msgSnippet: Ernst, These ideas sound interesting. Can you turn them into test cases? Regards, Kent Beck Three Rivers Institute _____ From: junit@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
Ernst,

These ideas sound interesting. Can you turn them into test cases?

Regards,

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute


_____

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
rei3ner
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2006 2:24 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener



Hi all,

currently i try to substitute for the junit3.x gui.
to this end i have to implement

org.junit.runner.notification.RunListener

I think it would be reasonable,
to extend this interface:
- start test: report timeout if any
- ignore test: report reason.

what do you think of it?

Greetings

Ernst
